p: An HI test was carried out using reference influenza A virus sera (kindly provided by FAO) of known anti hemagglutinin (HA) antibody (H5, H7, H9) titers as recommended in standard protocol [17]. The HI titer was expressed as the reciprocal of the highest serum dilution that completely inhibits hemagglutination. Serum samples indicating <8 HI titer were regarded as negative.
